title: Graphic & Web Design Intern
summary: Worked on WordPress-based client sites using custom PHP shortcodes, CSS, and responsive design principles. Created tutorial posts and improved site functionality for better user engagement.

title: Resident Technology Support Liaison
summary: Assisted senior residents with technology issues, teaching them to use smartphones, tablets, and computers. Improved digital literacy and accessibility within the community.

title: Web Design Chair
organization: Lambda Phi Epsilon International Fraternity, Inc.
summary: Redesigned the fraternity’s website and developed responsive layouts with HTML/CSS/JS. Collaborated with chapter members to improve usability and modernize the digital presence.

title: Fundraising Chair
organization: Lambda Phi Epsilon International Fraternity, Inc.
summary: Organized and led fundraising events to support chapter activities, building event management and teamwork skills.

title: Social Chair
organization: Lambda Phi Epsilon International Fraternity, Inc.
summary: Planned and hosted social events that strengthened community and collaboration across chapters.

title: Volunteer Photographer
summary: Captured photos for local art exhibitions and community events, focusing on storytelling and visual design through composition and lighting.
